description: Sustainable Development  through Peace building, governance and Economic Recovery in NWFP

subproject.corporate outcome: National and local institutions have the capacity to respond to gender-based violence and to increase women’s civic engagement, participation and leadership in crisis prevention, ongoing crisis and post-crisis contexts
subproject.description: Early Recovery needs identified and Plan produced for NWFP. Access of conflict affected communities to socioeconomic services and livelihood opportunities enhanced through improved community infrastructure , skill development, asset replacement and cash for work. Environment practices enhanced through alternative use of energy and MED.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: CPR-Peace & Devlopmnt Programe
